entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning this evening. Local blowing snow. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Light snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clearing early in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023
